name: 10 Stories: Find the Differences
description:
10 Stories - Find the Differences

Find the differences through the pages of 10 fully illustrated stories.  Take all your time in "Relaxed" mode or race against the clock for a high-score in "Time Trial" mode. Once you've played through the stories, revisit them in "Story" mode to just enjoy the work of the artists. Scores and "Relaxed" mode progress are saved.

Stories

  • Where are you Bunny Bunny?
  • Animal Prison Break
  • A tale of Finding my Heart
  • Halloween Love Potion
  • A Robot's Christmas
  • The Boxer
  • The Little Sailor
  • Farm Hero
  • Fabiola's Friendly Farm
  • Dragon's Mom
